description: Pet owners also need to consider the hidden costs of buying from unethical and unlicensed breeders. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The true cost of that doggie in the window is more than just its price tag
title_page: The true cost of that doggie in the window is more than just its price tag | The Straits Times
